post:
Hey Guys,
I've joined CrownCloud [https://crowncloud.net] and they've been offering VPS's for around ~2 weeks or so, **I'll be doing their community sales/support only on LowEndTalk, I<3 LET** while other guys at CrownCloud will be doing the same on other forums :) 

All the VPS's come with,
1 Gbit Shared Line
Dedicated RAM 
1 MB Burst (Yes, 1 MB)
4 Shared Cores of AMD FX-4100 at 3.6Ghz / 3.8Ghz (Turbo) 
1 Static IPv4

This is not exactly a promo plan as it can be ordered without a coupon code etc but well here goes,

VPS-128
Type : OpenVZ
128 MB RAM
20 GB HDD
200 GB Bandwidth

Order Link (OpenVZ) :
http://crowncloud.net/clients/order.php


LET Promo KVM-128 
Type : OpenVZ
128 MB RAM
20 GB HDD
200 GB Bandwidth
All Linux OS's except Arch Linux (Until we find a working ISO) and Windows XP

Order Link (KVM) :
http://crowncloud.net/clients/order.php?o=AIDWXdhs

And NO ! that's not a ref link, its a order link which has only the KVM plans.

We offer support via Email and IRC.

Email : support[@]crowncloud.net
IRC : #CrownCloud on FreeNode

Do note : There is no panel with these VPS's for now, reboots can be done via SSH, reinstalls have to be done by us and are free :) for reinstalls email support[@]crowncloud.net

Hmm.. This is the 1st "offer" post I've made on LowEndTalk, bring em' trolls on :P

Payment methods accepted : PayPal (contact us if you want to pay with LibertyReserve)
Location : Kansas City, MO
TOS/AUP :  http://wiki.crowncloud.net/doku.php?id=vps_tos
Test IP : 199.168.100.85
Test File : 199.168.100.85/100mb.test
Test File 2 : 199.168.100.85/10mb.test
